q: SELECT i/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070]/value/value AS medication FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS INSTRUCTION i[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3] WHERE (c/archetype_details/template_id/value MATCHES {'vitagroup-medication-list.v0'} AND e/ehr_id/value = '${ehr_id}')
